Sanjay is a well-spoken, detailed-oriented Project Manager who has the flexibility to manage several complex projects at once. Sanjay is always ready to learn a new skill or take on a new task with the kind of grace and discipline that makes him a flexible and welcome asset on any team. Sanjay demonstrates, on a daily basis, the rare talent of being an assertive motivator, a skilled diplomat, and a studious learner. Sometimes, he may assume all three roles in the same conversation. This is because he is a person who takes pride and ownership of any task under his charge. At Revitas, I have seen him not only roll up his sleeves and help his team troubleshoot on technology related issues but also provide business value added solutions to the end users, while very effectively managing the Project.
